tags.name: Core
tags.description: Rainwave REST-ish endpoints for core Rainwave interactivity, as used on the website.

tags.name: Websocket
tags.description: Endpoints that begin websocket connections for Rainwave.

get.description: Upgrades HTTP connection to a WebSocket session for the station.

sort.description: How to sort the songs that are a part of the album.

post.description: Returns all albums on the station, sorted by album ID.

order.description: A comma-separated list of Song IDs that represent the user's request queue, in the order the user desires.
